tasks.label: Import from Supabase (every 3 hours)
args: Set-Location -LiteralPath "${workspaceFolder}"; if (Test-Path ".\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1") { . ".\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1" }; while ($true) { Write-Host ("[{0}] import_from_supabase..." -f (Get-Date -Format s)); python .\import_from_supabase.py; Write-Host ("[{0}] done; sleeping 3h" -f (Get-Date -Format s)); Start-Sleep -Seconds 10800 }
